content:
Change the email below to a text format and make it shorter and more easier to understand 

Dear Professor,

I hope this email finds you well. I am currently enrolled in your section of Math 215 section 1. However, I am reaching out to inquire about the possibility of switching to section 2 of the course, as the scheduled time conflicts with another class that I am also trying to take.

I understand that the section I am interested in switching to may currently be full, but I wanted to check in with you to see if there may be any available spots or if there are any alternative solutions that we could consider. I am very interested in taking your class, and I would be grateful for any help you could provide in this matter.

Please let me know if this is something we can discuss further or if there is anything else I need to do in order to explore this option. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best, 
Nahom Mekonen
